```{r setup}
library(MicrobiomeBenchmarkData)
library(MicrobiomeBenchmarkDataAnalyses)
library(mia)
library(phyloseq)
```

# Data

Import TreeSummarizedEperiment:

```{r}
tse <- getDataset('HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V13', dryrun = FALSE)[[1]]
ps <- makePhyloseqFromTreeSummarizedExperiment(tse)
ps
```

# Prior knowledge 

```{r}
row_data <- as.data.frame(rowData(tse))
row_data$taxon_name <- rownames(row_data)
row_data$new_names <- paste0(row_data$taxon_name, '|', row_data$genus)
prior_info <- row_data[, c('taxon_name', 'new_names', 'genus', 'taxon_annotation')]
```


# Divde by rank

```{r}
tse_by_ranks <- splitByRanks(tse)
tse_genus <- tse_by_ranks$genus
tse_genus
```
```{r}
row_data_genus <- as.data.frame(rowData(tse_genus))
```
